DOC.brief_summary: Clinical Trial TRN-002 Women Irritable Bowel Syndrome ( IBS ) The purpose study investigate safety effectiveness new investigational drug woman treatment diarrhea-predominant irritable bowel syndrome . The investigational drug natural product take plant grow South America . The study medication administer orally twice day . Subjects able remain certain standard IBS medication ( anti-diarrheals ) participate study . The total duration study 18 week . The study require five study visit include physical exam , ECG , blood draw , laboratory study , colon procedure ( colonoscopy flexible sigmoidoscopy appropriate procedure perform last 5 year . ) Participants ask make entry touch-tone telephone diary daily basis . Participants must meet following criterion : - Females least 18 year age - Diagnosis diarrhea predominant Irritable Bowel Syndrome - Willingness make daily call touch-tone telephone - Willingness endoscopic and/or radiologic bowel evaluation , receive one past 5 year . - Willingness take approve method birth control ( require ) Participants CAN NOT meet follow criterion : - Serious medical surgical condition - Colon Cancer , Crohns Disease Ulcerative Colitis - Pregnant breast feeding
